Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 19, 2025

1. Introduction

Reso ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy. Our core philosophy is simple: What happens on your Mac, stays on your Mac. This Privacy Policy explains how our macOS application handles your data.

2. Data Processing

Reso is a strictly local application. All voice processing, transcription, and text generation occurs directly on your device using the Apple Neural Engine and local AI models.

  • We do not upload your voice recordings to any cloud server.
  • We do not send your transcribed text to any third party.
  • We do not collect usage data or analytics from the application content itself.

3. Data Collection

We collect minimal data required for licensing and app functionality:

  • License Verification: We check your license key status via a secure, encrypted request to our Gumroad/LemonSqueezy provider.
  • Crash Reports: macOS may ask to send anonymous crash reports to Apple, which we can view to fix bugs. This is optional and controlled by your macOS system settings.

4. Third-Party Services

Our website uses basic analytics (like Google Analytics) to measure site traffic. This does not connect to the Reso application itself. The application is completely isolated from these tracking scripts.

5. Your Consent

By using Reso, you consent to this Privacy Policy. Since we do not store your personal data, there is nothing for us to delete or export upon requestâ€”you already own 100% of your data on your local machine.

6. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: dev@dzgapp.com.
